Class AlicornDust

  • java.lang.Object
    • HealingItem
      • AlicornDust

  • public class AlicornDust
extends HealingItem
    Instances of AlicornDust represent a type of healing item that the player can obtain in the game. Each object represents one healing item. A new instance should be created whenever the team obtains an Alicorn Dust item, and deleted when all of its increments have been applied to a hero.
